alert.note: Alert for Harper (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 8:58PM CST until February 26 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR HARPER COUNTY... At 857 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Anthony, moving northeast at 50 mph. A 70mph gust was recently reported 4N Manchester Oklahoma. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Harper, Bluff City, Danville, Freeport, Runnymede and Crystal Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
